Module org.nasdanika.common
Package org.nasdanika.common

Interface Adaptable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Base64, Block, Call, Composite, Configurator, Container, Eval, Fail, File, Filter, Interpolator, List, Map, Markdown, ModelElement, NamedElement, Period, Resource, Resource, Temporal, Text
All Known Implementing Classes:
Base64Impl, BlockImpl, CallImpl, CompositeImpl, ConfiguratorImpl, ContainerImpl, EObjectAdaptable, EvalImpl, FailImpl, FileImpl, FilterImpl, InterpolatorImpl, ListImpl, MapImpl, MarkdownImpl, ModelElementImpl, NamedElementImpl, PeriodImpl, ResourceImpl, ResourceImpl, TemporalImpl, TextImpl
public interface Adaptable
Something that can be adapted to a different type. Can be used to access contextual information.
Author:
Pavel
